original_title: Avantasia - The Flying Opera: Around the World in Twenty Days
overview: The Flying Opera is the first Avantasia live album by German power metal vocalist Tobias Sammet, released in March 2011. It was recorded during their first world tour in 2008, in support of the album The Scarecrow.
tagline: Recorded at The Scarecrow World Tour, 2008
title: Avantasia - The Flying Opera: Around the World in Twenty Days
